articles.title: Greta Thunberg named TIME’s 2019 ‘Person of the Year’
articles.description: Sweden-born teen activist Greta Thunberg is Time Magazine's 2019 "Person of the Year,” the company announced on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Greta Thunberg, the Swedish teenage environmental activist, is Time Magazine's 2019 "Person of the Year,” the publication announced on Wednesday.
The 16-year-old Thunberg has gained worldwide exposure for raising awareness of climate change.

articles.description: Sen. Tom Cotton, R-Ark., is expected to introduce on Wednesday a bill to subject Mexican cartels to the same level of sanctions as terror groups.
